com.mapgroup.classificator.controller

Class SendMailExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.controller.SendMailExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerExecutor

    public class SendMailExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerExecutor
    This class grants to the client to send a mail report of the current prediction session to multiple email addressees and attach to this report also a pdf document which contains the result of all the user's operation that he has done during the prediction session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SendMailExecutor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerResponse executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
      Sends an email to the addressees present in a specific structure contained in the specified structure contextRequest, from the user's email address with the report of the prediction session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SendMailExecutor

        public SendMailExecutor()

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        public ServerResponse executeCommand(ContextRequest contextRequest)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends an email to the addressees present in a specific structure contained in the specified structure contextRequest, from the user's email address with the report of the prediction session.

        The user is also able to specify if he wants to sends a pdf document as attachment. This document contains within it, all the user's choices made during the prediction session and the string representation of the decision tree.

        The structure which contains all the information about the email, is contained in a specific structure called MailDataTO which grants to the server to obtain all the needed information to send correctly the email from the client's email address, such as the username for the email address, the email address's password.

        The context request structure must have these specific parameters in the order:

        • null
        • null
        • mail data structure (information about the email that will be sent)
        • client ip address
        Specified by:
        executeCommand in interface IServerExecutor
        Parameters:
        contextRequest - information about the context in which the computation will be done
        Returns:
        the server response with a message which represents the correct execution of the process
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if some errors in sending the email or creating the pdf occurred
